data: This PowerPlan must be placed by a Hematologist or in consultation with the on-call Hematologist
Use largest vein available for peripheral IV, if no central line available
100 mL, IV, once, drug form: bag
Transfusion Medicine provider consultation is required prior to ordering Hemin given special approval and ordering is required
For approval, complete Canadian Blood Services request form and fax to Transfusion Medicine
For intermittent acute porphyria refer to Blood Product Fact Sheet for dosing
routine, mg, IV, Administer over: 30 -60 minute, q24h, Acute Porphyria, Refer to Blood Product Fact Sheet for special handling requirements, T;N
